verbs.description: Three [ARGM-MNR: poorly] - [V: made] [ARG1: wax figures] of United States President Donald Trump , North Korean leader Kim Jong - un and Russian President Vladimir Putin were erected at an exhibit in Shanghai this week .

Three poorly - made wax figures of United States President Donald Trump , North Korean leader Kim Jong - un and Russian President Vladimir Putin [V: were] erected at an exhibit in Shanghai this week .

[ARG1: Three poorly - made wax figures of United States President Donald Trump , North Korean leader Kim Jong - un and Russian President Vladimir Putin] were [V: erected] [ARGM-LOC: at an exhibit in Shanghai] [ARGM-TMP: this week] .
